short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close all tabs with a single shortcut key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever need to close all your tabs in a hurry? Look no further. The Hide All Button is your shortcut to quickly close everything with just one shortcut press (Ctrl+Shift+Y) You can always change this shortcut if you right click the icon and press "Manage Extension" > Keyboard Shortcuts . Perfect for when you need to clean up your screen, get rid of distractions, or just “poof” everything away. Plus, it’s not just about hiding the mess. You can restore your tabs later, no problem. To restore, left click the icon and press the "Restore Tabs" button!
